meanings: nation, people, the public; (왕정 국가의) subject; (시민권을 가진) citizen; (외국에 살고 있는) national

examples.korean: Citizenship is about the sense of nationhood. 발음듣기 시민권은 국민으로서의 의식과 관련된 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Citizenship is about the sense of nationhood. 발음

examples.korean: The whole country was horrified by the killings. 발음듣기 전 국민이 그 살해 행위들에 몸서리를 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole country was horrified by the killings. 발음

examples.korean: A statue in his memory was erected by public subscription. 발음듣기 그를 기리는 동상이 일반 국민들의 모금으로 설립되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A statue in his memory was erected by public subscription. 발음

examples.korean: calls for national unity 발음듣기 국민의 단결에 대한 요구 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Polish nationals living in Germany 발음듣기 독일에 사는[재독] 폴란드 국민들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
